info.title: Trial Container API
info.description: This is api specs for trial container endpoints

tags.name: Trial Container Forms Templates
tags.description: Endpoints for Trial Container Forms Templates

get.summary: Get an asset in a trial container
get.description: Get an asset in a trial container
Retrieves a list of form templates for the specified trial container.

parameters.name: trial_container_id
parameters.description: The ID of the trial container.

parameters.name: form_container_id
parameters.description: The ID of the form container used to filter templates.

parameters.name: form_container_type
parameters.description: The type of form container used to filter templates.

example: 1.BSID GM #4:Child holds head erect for at least 3 seconds without support.

3.BSID GM #7: Child stands in upright position on both feet, holding on stable object (eg. Furniture) with 1 or both hands. One leg moves forward while the other supports part of the body weight. Child takes at least 5 steps in in this manner. (Walking with assistance -WHO).

created_at.description: The form version created at date

title.description: The current form template version title
The current form template version title
